entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 05:46 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -31.0°C
Pressure: 104.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -33.9°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
